CustomField.formula: IF(Discount__c <= (Total_Amount_on_Parts_del__c + Total_Cost_Labor__c + Shop_Supplies_Total__c + Total_Misc__c + Shipping_Charge__c), (Total_Amount_on_Parts_del__c + Total_Cost_Labor__c + Shop_Supplies_Total__c + Total_Misc__c + Shipping_Charge__c) - Discount__c , Total_Amount_on_Parts_del__c + Total_Cost_Labor__c + Shop_Supplies_Total__c + Total_Misc__c + Shipping_Charge__c)
CustomField.label: Total Amount Job
